TopicTitle: Always getting stuck on the loading screen

Articles.Content:
I have an issue that softlocks me out of the game. So I'm always getting stuck on the loading screen after all the assets are loaded (The one with the icon in the bottom right). It just stays on the screen and never loads. I added available updates on CKAN and checked the logs. I will attach my modlist below.

Spoiler

Edited April 10, 2023 by 18Watt
Moved mod list to spoiler window.

Howdy @Duckk, and welcome to the KSP forums!

What platform are you on?  If you're on Mac (OS X) I may have a fix for you.  

Edit:  I edited your post to put the long list of mods inside a spoiler window.  That is not strictly required, but it does make the forums more manageable for people viewing on mobile devices.

It's a wild guess, but last time I got this, it was a thumbs failing to  be loaded.

Find and delete all @thumbs directories on your KSP installation. With a bit of luck, this will solve it.
